p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).

th_99: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_102: Our program is well-established and highly competitive. We offer an outstanding benefits package, competitive salaries, and a low cost of living. We also offer generous but not required internal moonlighting opportunities. Our highly experienced faculty, low resident to faculty ratio, and lack of fellows combine to make this program one of the best in the nation.
